concept.definition: Provider is contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates
Provider is  not contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates

description: Whether the cost applies to in-network or out-of-network providers.
name: BenefitCostApplicability

text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/insuranceplan-applicability defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
in-network In NetworkProvider is contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates
out-of-network Out of NetworkProvider is not contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates
other OtherOther applicability
